# MedStore - Pharmacy Website

## Project Overview
This is a full-stack online pharmacy e-commerce platform similar to 1mg, built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 15.5.7 (App Router)
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Package Manager**: npm

## Key Features
- Product catalog for medicines and health products
- Category-wise navigation (Medicines, Healthcare, Diagnostics, Vaccines, Devices, Wellness)
- Shopping cart functionality
- Prescription upload feature
- Search functionality
- Featured products with discounts
- Health articles section
- Fully responsive design

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server (http://localhost:3000)
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm start` - Start production server
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Project Structure
- `/src/app` - Next.js app directory with pages and layouts
- `/src/components` - React components (Header, Footer, Hero, Categories, etc.)
- `/.github` - GitHub configuration and Copilot instructions
- `/public` - Static assets

## Deployment
The project is ready to deploy on Vercel, Netlify, or any Next.js-compatible platform.

## Notes
- Product images currently use emoji placeholders
- Authentication and payment features to be added in future
- Backend API integration pending
